name: deviceTemperatureSetting_setMin
description: This function is used to set the temperature of a SmartThings device to its minimum value.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the temperature to minimum.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature to minimum.
